title: 服务器安装了创世神插件没用
author: Aogni
txt_content:
以下是配置文件
#
# WorldEdit's configuration file
#
# About editing this file:
# - DO NOT USE TABS. You MUST use spaces or Bukkit will complain. If
#   you use an editor like Notepad++ (recommended for Windows users), you
#   must configure it to "replace tabs with spaces." In Notepad++, this can
#   be changed in Settings > Preferences > Language Menu.
# - Don't get rid of the indents. They are indented so some entries are
#   in categories (like "max-blocks-changed" is in the "limits"
#   category.
# - If you want to check the format of this file before putting it
#   into WorldEdit, paste it into http://yaml-online-parser.appspot.com/
#   and see if it gives "ERROR:".
# - Lines starting with # are commentsand so they are ignored.
#

limits:
    allow-extra-data-values: false
    max-blocks-changed:
        default: -1
        maximum: -1
    max-polygonal-points:
        default: -1
        maximum: 20
    max-radius: -1
    max-super-pickaxe-size: 5
    max-brush-radius: 5
    butcher-radius:
        default: -1
        maximum: -1
    disallowed-blocks: [6, 7, 14, 15, 16, 26, 27, 28, 29, 39, 31, 32, 33, 34, 36, 37, 38, 39, 40, 46, 50, 51, 56, 59, 69, 73, 74, 75, 76, 77, 81, 83]

use-inventory:
    enable: false
    allow-override: true
    creative-mode-overrides: false

logging:
    log-commands: false
    file: worldedit.log

super-pickaxe:
    drop-items: true
    many-drop-items: false

snapshots:
    directory:

navigation-wand:
    item: 345
    max-distance: 100

scripting:
    timeout: 3000
    dir: craftscripts

saving:
    dir: schematics

files:
    allow-symbolic-links: false

history:
    size: 15
    expiration: 10

wand-item: 272
shell-save-type:
no-double-slash: false
no-op-permissions: false
debug: false

replies.author: Aogni
replies.txt_content:
网络摆渡客 发表于 2014-12-5 14:00
怎么工具是石剑？
改了能有用？ 可是连//set 指令都没用

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content:
Aogni 发表于 2014-12-5 14:05
改了能有用？ 可是连//set 指令都没用
执行指令后请看控制台有没有报错。

replies.author: Aogni
replies.txt_content:
网络摆渡客 发表于 2014-12-5 14:14
执行指令后请看控制台有没有报错。
后台没反应! 执行指令后 Unknown command Type "/help" for help !插件没加载成功？

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content:
Aogni 发表于 2014-12-5 14:19
后台没反应! 执行指令后 Unknown command Type "/help" for help !插件没加载成功？
恩，检查一下版本吧。或者重启一次看一下日志有没有相关报错。

replies.author: Aogni
replies.txt_content:
网络摆渡客 发表于 2014-12-5 14:28
恩，检查一下版本吧。或者重启一次看一下日志有没有相关报错。
版本对的！论坛下的！重启没用！

replies.author: 网络摆渡客
replies.txt_content:
Aogni 发表于 2014-12-5 18:56
版本对的！论坛下的！重启没用！
把logs/latest.log日志后缀改成yml上传附件。

replies.author: Aogni
replies.txt_content:
网络摆渡客 发表于 2014-12-5 19:17
把logs/latest.log日志后缀改成yml上传附件。
就是 yml 啊！没错的！
